The Last Supper Club

Your personalised dining experience.

4th - 12th July

We believe that great food with your best friends should be fuss free. That's why we've created an evening where you pick the menu, without the hassle of preparing, serving or clearing up afterwards. A home cooked meal where none of you have to host.

Pick two courses, a couple of companions and bring your own beverage. We sort out the rest, along with a few edible extras, for a set price of Â£24 per head.

The venue

Our Victorian venue is located in E14. It's a peculiar section of London classed as both zones 2 and 3. Our exact location will be revealed to you when you book with us.

The cook

Mr B. spent his childhood cooking dinner parties for his parents. When he grew up, he went on a ski season to refine his skills serving delicious food in a fine wooden chalet. Despite his love for food (and mountains), he ended up back in the UK working as a designer. While he built websites, he continued to cook and eat plenty of food, but it was never as rewarding as when he was serving it to others. So he started The Last Supper Club. The rest, he hopes, will soon be history.

Got a question?

Just email us on lastsupperclublondon@gmail.com
